answers.answer:
Newcomers in Oradea can find help and important contacts, including the Bihor County Immigration Service and a call center for Ukraine, by visiting the dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-oradea website.

To find detailed information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-oradea. On this page, you can read under various sections such as "Important contacts," "The support program for accommodation, meals and integration in Oradea," "Medical services," "Psychological support," "Education," and "Organisations offering their support."

Yes, free, anonymous, and confidential psycho-medical-social HIV services are available in Romania through 10 Regional HIV Centers and Sens Pozitiv.

To find more detailed information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-oradea and navigate to the "Ask for help" section, specifically under "Counseling for people living with HIV."
